creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
text:
Situation:

-> menu File -> Logout (but I didn't push "logout" on the following screen)
- after an hour (I guess) my lenya session expired
- only now I pushed the "logout" button and I got this error:



An error occured.
The continuation ID 7a1f2c8a8d3680076e6f6e384b65690918714426 is invalid. at
<map:call> -
file:/home/forrer/cms/build-trunk/jakarta-tomcat-5.0.30/webapps/lenya/lenya/modules/usecase/usecase.xmap:101:39
at <map:mount> -
file:/home/forrer/cms/build-trunk/jakarta-tomcat-5.0.30/webapps/lenya/sitemap.xmap:621:131

org.apache.cocoon.components.flow.InvalidContinuationException: The continuation
ID 7a1f2c8a8d3680076e6f6e384b65690918714426 is invalid. at <map:call> -
file:/home/forrer/cms/build-trunk/jakarta-tomcat-5.0.30/webapps/lenya/lenya/modules/usecase/usecase.xmap:101:39
at <map:mount> -
file:/home/forrer/cms/build-trunk/jakarta-tomcat-5.0.30/webapps/lenya/sitemap.xmap:621:131

cause: org.apache.cocoon.components.flow.InvalidContinuationException: The
continuation ID 7a1f2c8a8d3680076e6f6e384b65690918714426 is invalid. at

creator: nettings@apache.org
text: cosmetic issue. a fix would be nice, but it need not make it into 2.0
